author: Adam Forrest, Adam Forrest
title: Help the Hungry: Food banks move towards home deliveries amid struggle to keep doors open
description: 'You just have to find a different way of doing things,' says food bank manager in Nottinghamshire – as new poll reveals scale of UK hunger crisis
content:
Food banks across the UK are struggling to stay open as the coronavirus outbreak continues to cause a sharp decline in volunteers and a shortage in food donations.
It comes as a new survey revealed the scale of the hunger crisis facing Britain. Some 1.5 mill… [+5608 chars]
